treatment: type:'randomized controlled trial' title:randomized abstract:randomized title:placebo abstract:placebo
diagnosis: title:sensitiv* abstract:sensitiv* mesh:'sensitivity and specificity' +(title:predictive abstract:predictive) +(title:value* abstract:value*) mesh:'predictive value of tests' title:accuracy* abstract:accuracy
prognosis: mesh:prognosis title:diagnosed abstract:diagnosed title:cohort* abstract:cohort* mesh:'cohort effect' mesh:'cohort studies' title:predictor* abstract:predictor* title:death abstract:death mesh:'models, statistical'
etiology: title:risk abstract:risk mesh:risk title:mortality abstract:mortality mesh:mortality title:cohort abstract:cohort
review: type:'meta analysis' title:'meta analysis' abstract:'meta analysis' mesh:'meta analysis' type:review title:search* abstract:search*
